Text:
And now brothers, if you would turn to the Book of Bricktop in your prayer guides...

And Bricktop said, "And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor, and though I give my body to be burned, it profiteth me nothing."

And I, like many others, am thankful for these gifts.  They have changed the way we are entertained. Changed how we share and touched countless souls. We are truly blessed.

For thine is the bluray, the ps3, and the glory
forever and ever, Amen.
